safenet.jcprov.params
Class CK_PKCS12_PBE_EXPORT_PARAMS

java.lang.Object
  safenet.jcprov.params.CK_PKCS12_PBE_EXPORT_PARAMS

public class CK_PKCS12_PBE_EXPORT_PARAMS
extends java.lang.Object

SafeNet Inc. UNSUPPORTED Extension - Further information is provided in the Programmers Manual.

Field Summary
 CK_MECHANISM_TYPE hmacKgMech
          HMAC mechanism for PFX Supported mechanism: - PBA_SHA1_WITH_SHA1_HMAC
 CK_OBJECT_HANDLE keyCert
          Handle to certificate associated to the private key

          AuthenticatedSafe password

          HMAC password
 long passwordHMACLen
          Size of HMAC password
 CK_MECHANISM_TYPE safeBagKgMech
          Encryption mechanism for SafeBag Supported mechanisms: - PBE_SHA1_RC4_128 - PBE_SHA1_RC4_40 - PBE_SHA1_DES3_EDE_CBC - PBE_SHA1_DES2_EDE_CBC - PBE_SHA1_RC2_128_CBC - PBE_SHA1_RC2_40_CBC
 CK_MECHANISM_TYPE safeContentKgMech
          Encryption mechanism for SafeContent Supported mechanisms: - PBE_SHA1_RC4_128 - PBE_SHA1_RC4_40 - PBE_SHA1_DES3_EDE_CBC - PBE_SHA1_DES2_EDE_CBC - PBE_SHA1_RC2_128_CBC - PBE_SHA1_RC2_40_CBC
 
Constructor Summary
CK_PKCS12_PBE_EXPORT_PARAMS()
          Values initialised to 0 or null
CK_PKCS12_PBE_EXPORT_PARAMS(CK_OBJECT_HANDLE keyCert, byte[] passwordAuthSafe, byte[] passwordHMAC)
          Simplified constructor where lengths and encryption algo are determined The following encryption algorithms are used : safeBagKgMech = PBE_SHA1_DES3_EDE_CBC safeContentKgMech = PBE_SHA1_RC2_40_CBC hmacKgMech = PBA_SHA1_WITH_SHA1_HMAC
CK_PKCS12_PBE_EXPORT_PARAMS(CK_OBJECT_HANDLE keyCert, byte[] passwordAuthSafe, byte[] passwordHMAC, CK_MECHANISM_TYPE safeBagKgMech, CK_MECHANISM_TYPE safeContentKgMech, CK_MECHANISM_TYPE hmacKgMech)
          Simplified constructor where lengths are determined
CK_PKCS12_PBE_EXPORT_PARAMS(CK_OBJECT_HANDLE keyCert, byte[] passwordAuthSafe, long passwordAuthSafeLen, byte[] passwordHMAC, long passwordHMACLen, CK_MECHANISM_TYPE safeBagKgMech, CK_MECHANISM_TYPE safeContentKgMech, CK_MECHANISM_TYPE hmacKgMech)
          Values initialised as specified

CK_PKCS12_PBE_EXPORT_PARAMS

public CK_PKCS12_PBE_EXPORT_PARAMS(CK_OBJECT_HANDLE keyCert,
                                   byte[] passwordAuthSafe,
                                   byte[] passwordHMAC)
Simplified constructor where lengths and encryption algo are determined The following encryption algorithms are used : safeBagKgMech = PBE_SHA1_DES3_EDE_CBC safeContentKgMech = PBE_SHA1_RC2_40_CBC hmacKgMech = PBA_SHA1_WITH_SHA1_HMAC
